snippet: Thorpe’s remains will stay in Jim Thorpe, Pa., despite the tribe and family of the famed athlete asking to have his remains returned to his boyhood home in what is now Oklahoma.
abstract: Supreme Court decides not to hear appeal by Sac and Fox Nation and sons of Olympic athlete and professional baseball and football player Jim Thorpe, who seek to move Thorpe's remains from town of Jim Thorpe, Pa, to tribal land in Oklahoma.
lead_paragraph: Thorpe’s remains will stay in Jim Thorpe, Pa., despite the tribe and family of the famed athlete asking to have his remains returned to his boyhood home in what is now Oklahoma.

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Declines to Hear Family’s Appeal in Dispute Over Jim Thorpe’s Remains
headline.main: Supreme Court Declines to Hear Jim Thorpe Appeal
